modules.description: Processes spreadsheet data by applying custom operations to column names and rows. Operates on sheet structures containing fields and value lists, enabling transformations and validations. Supports tasks like data filtering, aggregation, and conversion to lists, with mutable field updates.

Provides operations to convert values to S-expressions and strings, check if a value is empty. Works with a generic value type that represents data from XLSX files. Used to process and inspect cell contents during spreadsheet parsing.

Processes spreadsheet data by transforming column names and rows through custom operations, working with sheet structures that include fields and value lists. It supports data filtering, aggregation, and conversion to lists, while allowing mutable updates to field values. Operations include renaming columns, applying row-level computations, and validating data integrity. Examples include converting currency values, filtering rows based on criteria, and restructuring data for analysis.

Provides functions to extract and manipulate parts of Office documents by parsing Open Packaging Conventions and SpreadsheetML XML structures. Works with XML elements, ZIP archives, and document relationships to access embedded content. Enables direct access to worksheet data and metadata from Excel files.

handles data from XLSX files by converting values to S-expressions and strings, checking for emptiness, and processing structured data through column renaming, row transformations, and data validation. It works with generic value types and sheet structures containing fields and value lists, enabling operations like currency conversion, row filtering, and data restructuring. Mutability allows updates to field values during processing. Examples include inspecting cell contents, filtering rows by condition, and aggregating data for analysis.
